channel.title: PLEASE HELP ASAP! Or you will DIEEEE! Okies?
channel.description:
Im currently trying to get mining and fishing to work on my server...if someone could please give me the code of it...Here's what I have so far so please help :P
For fishing: For object 42, adds item id 317, does emote/animation 897, gives 1 k Fishing EXP, says you caught a shrimp, no minimum lvl. Need a small net in your invent for you to be able to fish. If you dont know how to do this part...you can skip it.
Also, just a quick question, how do you make it so that you need a certain lvl to fish for certain object ids?
For Mining: I dont really feel like getting all the ids for everything...if mining works on yours can you just copy and paste the case #s: and all the codes and everything? thanks.

item.title: PLEASE HELP ASAP! Or you will DIEEEE! Okies?
